description: Initial execution of malicious document calls wmic Win32_Process::Create to execute the file with regsvr32 Author: Vadim Khrykov (ThreatIntel), Cyb3rEng (Rule). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: EDR WMI Command Execution by Office Applications
query: (EventLog:"EDR" AND winlog.event_data.EventType:"WMIExecution" AND WMIcommand:*Win32_Process\\\:\\\:Create* AND process.executable:(*\\winword.exe OR *\\excel.exe OR *\\powerpnt.exe))
